name: End-user help text for creating an account with LDAP

inline.description:
End-user help text for creating an account with LDAP
————————————————————————————
  1. Go to login page on an open server
  2. Click "Create one now"
  3. Hit the "AD/LDAP Credentials" button
  4. User redirected to the login page
inline.expectedResult: • Information message above login credentials that says "Enter your AD/LDAP username and password to create an account."

customFields.Related ticket(s): LDAP button to create new account now redirects to login page with no information to end user — MM-12429
